artist: Artist: Utagawa Kuniyoshi; Publisher: Iseya Ichibei
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: The story of the woman; She lived in Ōmi, a courtesan with a gentle heart and physical toughness. She was known as the woman wrestler in the neighborhood. One day, she stopped a frightened wild horse that could have caused a trouble to the people.
portfolio: From Legends of the Extraordinary People of Loyality and Filital Piety (Chūkō meiyo ki-jin den)
title: Keyblock impression for "The Woman Wrestler ??"
